description: ResourceQuota sets aggregate quota restrictions enforced per namespace

apiVersion.description: apiVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

metadata.description: Standard object's metadata. The name must be a valid DNS subdomain name.

status.description: Status defines the actual enforced quota and its current usage. This field will be copied from the existing object when updating.
